triples.name: Modal logic
triples.relevance: The paper extends and builds upon the foundational framework of modal logic.

triples.name: Game semantics
triples.relevance: The paper introduces game-theoretic definitions as one of two methods for formalizing the semantics of the modal language.

triples.name: Recursive definition
triples.relevance: The paper introduces an inductive definition approach for the semantics of the modal language.
